name: Microsoft Intune
description: This plugin fetches Devices data from the 'Devices > All Devices' page on Microsoft Intune platform. This plugin supports 'Reboot Device', 'Sync Device', 'Run Windows Defender Scan' and 'Update Windows Defender Signatures' actions on the Microsoft Intune platform.

configuration.label: Client ID
configuration.description: Client ID for the Microsoft Azure Application. On your Microsoft Azure portal navigate to 'Azure Entra ID > App registrations > Your Application > Overview' page and get the Client ID.

configuration.label: Client Secret
configuration.description: Client Secret for Microsoft Azure Application. On your Microsoft Azure portal navigate to 'Azure Entra ID > App registrations > Your Application > Certificates & Secrets' page and get the Client Secret. Note: Make sure to copy the client secret value and not the Secret ID.

configuration.label: Tenant ID
configuration.description: Tenant ID for the Microsoft Azure Application. On your Microsoft Azure portal navigate to 'Azure Entra ID > App registrations > Your Application > Overview' page and get the Tenant ID.
